subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में किस पसंदीदा कंटेन है?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort is a famous fort located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It is known for its strategic location and historical significance.
explanation_hi: कुम्बलगढ़ कंटेन, राजस्थान में संती स्थित है। उसके संती स्थिती और इसका विशेष संती स्थिती से ज्ञान से बिस्तान में संती है।
explanation_en: Amber Fort is the famous historical monument located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built by Maharaja Mansingh I in 1592 and is known for its stunning architecture.

explanation_en: Amber Fort, also known as Jal Mahal, was built by Maharaja Man Singh I in 1592 in Jaipur.
